title: BUNNY.
content: BUNNY, Bunny, Go away, Come again Another day. Dolly’s crying; She’s afraid! See the trouble You have made! There’s a darling, Bunny, go, For my shoes Are off, you know, And your funny Wiggling nose Will be nibbling At my toes. You have spoiled your snowy dress; You have soiled your toes, I guess. Bunny, Bunny, go away, Come again another day.

book.title: A Little Colored Boy and Other Stories
book.description: 简介： I think it more likely that God put an angels voice in Neddys throat to give us a taste of heavenly music, said grandma, looking up from the apples she was paring....
